abstract.text: Displays a modal sheet that shows the results of a certificate trust evaluation and that allows the user to edit trust settings.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: The parent window to which the sheet is attached.
The delegate object in which the method specified in the
parameter is implemented.
A method selector for a delegate method called when the sheet has been dismissed. Implementation of this delegate method is optional.
A pointer to data that is passed to the delegate method. You can use this data pointer for any purpose you wish.
A trust management object. Use the
function (in Security/SecTrust.h) to create the trust management object.
A message string to display in the sheet.
The delegate method has the following signature:
The parameters for the delegate method are:
The window to which the sheet was attached.
The result code indicating which button the user clicked: either
or
Client-defined contextual data that is passed in the
parameter of the
method.
The delegate method may dismiss the keychain settings sheet itself; if it does not, the sheet is dismissed on return from the
method.

abstract.text: Creates a trust management object based on certificates and policies.
Retrieves details on the outcome of a call to the function `SecTrustEvaluate`.
Provide user interface elements for security features such as authorization, access to digital certificates, and access to items in keychains.
A panel or sheet that lets the user edit the trust settings in any of the certificates in a certificate chain.
Displays a modal sheet that shows the results of a certificate trust evaluation and that allows the user to edit trust settings.
Displays a modal panel that shows the results of a certificate trust evaluation and that allows the user to edit trust settings.
An object used to evaluate trust.
A window that an app displays on the screen.
A Unicode string value that is a collection of characters.
A singleton actor whose executor is equivalent to the main dispatch queue.
A raw pointer for accessing and manipulating untyped data.

parameter is implemented.
A method selector for a delegate method called when the sheet has been dismissed. Implementation of this delegate method is optional.
A pointer to data that is passed to the delegate method. You can use this data pointer for any purpose you wish.
A trust management object. Use the
function (in Security/SecTrust.h) to create the trust management object.
A message string to display in the sheet.
